articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Will the Ukraine war become a wider European conflict? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Kyiv calls for fighter jets after Germany agrees to allow the deployment of Leopard 2 tanks.
articles.content:
Russias invasion of Ukraine has caused thousands of deaths and destroyed entire cities.
Western countries have answered Kyivs pleas for military aid.
Does this mean the conflict has become an inter… [+408 chars]
